author: Diana Olick
title: Residential construction is bright spot in jobs report, but more workers start to stay home
description: Construction has been deemed essential by the federal government, but a growing number of residential construction workers are pulling back, worried about catching the coronavirus.
content:
Construction has been deemed essential by the federal government, but a growing number of residential construction workers are pulling back, worried about catching the coronavirus.
